project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C774A-SUBV-07-ST01-DT05-DF14-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read an unsigned hex int from the input. If unsigned is > FFFF, do nothing. Otherwise, open that many files for writing, without closing the file handles. Output if any of the opens fail. The opens will fail if we try to open more than 1021 files.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C774A-SUBV-07-ST01-DT05-DF14-CF24-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read an unsigned hex int from the input. If unsigned is > FFFF, do nothing. Otherwise, open that many files for writing, without closing the file handles. Output if any of the opens fail. The opens will fail if we try to open more than 1021 files.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
